channel.title: SoulX - 24/7 Great Pking- Decent combat - [New PK'ing/Spawn Server]
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://soulxwebclient.net76.net/Webclient/1RiRc.png[/img] [CENTER][URL=http://soulxwebclient.net76.net/Forums.html/] Forums[/URL] | [URL=http://soulxwebclient.net76.net/Webclient/soulx.html]Webclient[/URL] [CENTER] SERVER ONLINE SINCE Tuesday july 03 2012[/CENTER] [/CENTER]
[COLOR=grey] Auto Cache Downloader 100% Runescape XP Bar Tormented Demons- Correct Emotes/GFX 614 Look, Less Lag Combat following (Melee/Range/Mage) Perfect Switching Curse Prayers work Current RS Firecape emote. Few Known dupes patched 634 items. 633 characters. 90% near Perfect Combat 602 anims including Korasi. New Skill Tab w/ hovering 95% Bridding/ Item Switching. Pk points Shop / Donator shop All spirit shields and their effects! Elysian- 70% chance to deduct and 30% damage. 508 maps & objects. 95% Dragon claws with perfected emote. New hitmarks like rs Including Criticals. Low client memory usage. New RS Loading Bar/Login Box/Background
[COLOR=PaleTurquoise][SIZE=3][B]Media[/B][/SIZE][/COLOR] [IMG]http://soulxwebclient.net76.net/Advertisement/1.gif[/img] [IMG]http://soulxwebclient.net76.net/Advertisement/2.gif[/img] [IMG]http://soulxwebclient.net76.net/Advertisement/3.gif[/img] [IMG]http://soulxwebclient.net76.net/Advertisement/4.gif[/img] [IMG]http://soulxwebclient.net76.net/Advertisement/5.gif[/img] [IMG]http://soulxwebclient.net76.net/Advertisement/6.gif[/img] [IMG]http://soulxwebclient.net76.net/Advertisement/7.gif[/img] [IMG]http://soulxwebclient.net76.net/Advertisement/8.gif[/img] [IMG]http://soulxwebclient.net76.net/Advertisement/9.gif[/img] [CENTER]MORE MEDIA COMING SOON![/CENTER]
